name: Tillie's Punctured Romance
summary_text: A con man from the city dupes a wealthy country girl into marriage.

name: Zvizdan

name: Lucky Luke and the Daltons

In a totalitarian future society, Winston Smith, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

summary_text: After destroying a giant asteroid heading towards Earth, a group of scientists unknowingly bring back a strange green substance that soon mutates into a monster.

name: They Wait
summary_text: A young mother and her six-year-old son come face to face with the mysteries of two murders and a great crime against the Chinese community into which they have recently arrived from Shanghai.

name: Trauma
summary_text: Shortly after waking up from a coma and discovering that his wife has been killed in a car accident, Ben befriends his beautiful young neighbor. But just as Ben begins to turn his life around, he is haunted by visions of his dead wife.

name: Schule
summary_text: The last three weeks of school life have begun: After the Abitur, Germany's leaving certificate, the friends and schoolmates of Gymnasium Kerkheim (Kerkheim High) will not see each other ...                See full summary »

name: Baby on Board
summary_text: Life for a successful power couple get thrown for a loop when the wife finds out she's pregnant.

name: Two Bits
summary_text: Gennaro lives with his ailing grandpa, who sits outside holding tight to his last quarter. But grandpa's not ready to die, he has some unfinished business with a woman from his past and he enlists Gennaro to act as his emissary.

name: Switchblade Sisters
summary_text: The leader of an inner city girl gang is challenged when a new girl moves into the neighbourhood.

name: Içimdeki Ses
summary_text: Selim, a self-confident writer living in his own world; As he cannot have a good relationship, he decides to live with his mother as a last resort to get rid of loneliness. Because of his ...                See full summary »

name: 2009: Lost Memories
summary_text: A failed assassination attempt in Harbin, China in 1909 changes the course of history. Now two JBI agents must find the connections between it and an ancient Korean artifact.

name: What Becomes of the Broken Hearted?
summary_text: Jake Muss' oldest son is killed in a gang fight and the younger son wants revenge, but Jake doesn't want to lose his other son to violence as well.

name: Shake Hands with the Devil
summary_text: The story of General Romeo Dallaire's frustrated efforts to stop the madness of the Rwandan Genocide, despite the complete indifference of his superiors.

name: Zebraman
summary_text: A down-and-out school teacher receives the calling to become the real life personification of an old television superhero, Zebraman.

name: Silentium
summary_text: A man who accused a catholic bishop of abusing him when he was a child dies in the Austrian city Salzburg. Everyone except his widow and the eccentrical detective Simon Brenner keeps silent and believes that the man killed himself.

name: Path to War
summary_text: In the mid 1960s, President Lyndon B. Johnson (Sir Michael Gambon) and his foreign-policy team debate the decision to withdraw from or escalate the war in Vietnam.

name: Tammy and the T-Rex
summary_text: An evil scientist implants the brain of Michael, a murdered high school student, into a Tyrannosaurus. He escapes, wreaks vengeance on his high school tormentors, and is reunited with his sweetheart Tammy.

name: Walker
summary_text: An unconventional retelling of the life of William Walker, a 19th century American mercenary leader who became the president of Nicaragua.

name: He Knows You're Alone
summary_text: A young bride-to-be is being stalked upon by a serial killer in Staten Island. She gets help from a former lover, but will they manage to escape?

name: Wild Horses
summary_text: A detective opens up a fifteen-year-old missing persons case, and begins to suspect that the missing boy was murdered, and that a local rancher was involved.

name: De dominee
summary_text: In the world of the drugs business - where it's is all about money - friendship and loyalty is most important. That is what becomes the demise of gangster Klaas Bruinsma.

name: I'm with Lucy
summary_text: A woman experiences five blind dates in one year, but only one of them is "Mr. Right".

name: Stay Cool
summary_text: An author who returns to his hometown to deliver a commencement address to a class of graduating high school students has to deal with his feelings for an old flame as well as the advances of a student who has the hots for him.

name: After Dark, My Sweet
summary_text: An ex-boxer is drifting around after escaping from the mental hospital. He meets a widow who convinces him to help fix up the neglected estate her ex-husband left. Her Uncle talks them both...                See full summary »

name: Never Grow Old
summary_text: An Irish undertaker profits when outlaws take over a peaceful American frontier town, but his family comes under threat as the death toll rises.

name: Levottomat 3 - kun mikään ei riitä
summary_text: Jonna, successful ad executive with husband Niklas and two small children, leads a double life. She is constantly on the lookout for quick casual sex. When she meets Aleksi, things start going awry in her personal and professional life.

name: Chasing Sleep
summary_text: A college professor wakes up to find his wife has not returned home, then struggles to understand her disappearance.

name: Loufa kai parallagi
summary_text: The "adventures" of some friends during their military service.

name: El olivo
summary_text: A girl, her uncle and a friend start an emotional travel to recover a family tree.

name: Memento Mori
summary_text: In this second installment of the Whispering Corridors series, a young girl finds a strange diary, capable of arousing hallucinations, kept by two of her senior fellow-students who seem to have an unusually close bond.

name: Skipped Parts
summary_text: An ungrounded young mother and her thoughtful teenage son are banished to a remote provincial town by her domineering father.

name: A Very Merry Mix-Up
summary_text: Alice is set to meet her future in-laws for the first time, but things don't go according to plan.

name: Vikingdom
summary_text: A forgotten king, Eirick, is tasked with the impossible odds to defeat Thor, the God of Thunder.

name: Swept from the Sea
summary_text: The story of Russian emigrant Yanko Goorall and servant Amy Foster in the end of nineteenth century. When Yanko enters a farm, sick and hungry after a shipwreck, everyone is afraid of him, except for Amy.

name: Peur sur la ville
summary_text: Commissaire Letellier and Inspector Moissac are tracking Minos, a serial killer whose victims are women.

name: Lourdes
summary_text: In order to escape her isolation, wheelchair-bound Christine makes a life changing journey to Lourdes, the iconic site of pilgrimage in the Pyrenees Mountains.

name: Jesse Stone: Thin Ice
summary_text: Jesse Stone and Captain Healy are shot during an unauthorized stake-out in Boston. Meanwhile, a cryptic letter sent from Paradise leads the mother of a kidnapped child to Stone. Though her son was declared dead, she hopes he will reopen the case.

name: Dead Fish
summary_text: Traitors, killers and lovers collide in London.

name: The Yellow Rolls-Royce
summary_text: Anthology movie about three owners of a yellow Rolls-Royce. A British diplomat buys the car for his French wife. A mobster's girlfriend has an affair in Italy. An American woman drives a Yugoslavian partisan to Ljubljana on the eve of the Nazi invasion.

name: Voksne mennesker
summary_text: A young man spurs romance and helps his friend and himself go through times and struggles of their ordinary life in Denmark.

name: Renegades
summary_text: An undercover cop forms an alliance with a Native American to help him hunt down the criminals who stole an ancient Lakota tribal lance.

name: Cabiria
summary_text: Cabiria is a Roman child when her home is destroyed by a volcano. Sold in Carthage to be sacrificed in a temple, is saved by Fulvio, a Roman spy. But danger lurks, and hatred between Rome and Carthage can only lead to war.

name: Road to Utopia
summary_text: Two vaudeville flops pose as bad guys and join the Klondike gold rush with a saloon singer.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
summary_text: A Tokyo college student is attacked by a ghoul, a superpowered human who feeds on human flesh. He survives, but has become part ghoul and becomes a fugitive on the run.

name: Rise of the Zombies
summary_text: When zombies overrun San Francisco, a desperate group survives by locking themselves inside Alcatraz Prison. When the undead breach the island, our heroes are forced to return to the mainland overrun with the undead.

name: Double World
summary_text: Seeing the neighboring country become more and more powerful, a warlord organizes a competition to reveal the best warriors. A young man is eager to bring honour to his clan.

name: Bedrooms and Hallways
summary_text: At the suggestion of a straight friend, gay man Leo joins a men's group, where he causes some upsets by declaring his attraction to one of its members.

name: Mermaid
summary_text: In Moscow, a young woman disappears after falling in love with a new man.

name: 3 Strikes
summary_text: Rob has 2 strikes and 3 strikes now means 25 to life. Leaving prison, he's picked up in a stolen car later stopped by the police. Can he prove his innocence before he's caught?

name: Double, Double Toil and Trouble
summary_text: On Halloween night, two precocious little girls try to save their parents from their nasty old capitalist aunt's greedy clutches. Magic abounds and they meet mysterious new friends along the way.

name: My Tutor
summary_text: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

name: Cesar Chavez
summary_text: A biography of the civil-rights activist and labor organizer Cesar Chavez.

name: Off the Map
summary_text: An eleven-year-old girl watches her father come down with a crippling depression. Over one summer, she learns answers to several mysteries, and comes to terms with love and loss.

name: El mismo amor, la misma lluvia
summary_text: The fascinating love story between Jorge and Laura from 1980 to 1999, within a context in which Argentine politics and history transits between the dictatorship, the Falklands war and the nascent democracy.

name: When Will I Be Loved
summary_text: Feeling undervalued by her boyfriend, a young woman begins to explore her sexuality with other people.

name: Gorgo
summary_text: Greedy sailors capture a giant lizard off the coast of Ireland and sell it to a London circus. Then its mother shows up.

name: Gangsta
summary_text: Antwerp. The lives of four dealer friends, who want to become real life swaggers, spin out of control when they steal a shipment of cocaine. They trigger a full out war between them, an ...                See full summary »

name: Teer enta
summary_text: A nerdy vet gets help from a genie to catch the attention of the woman he loves.

name: The Dog Problem
summary_text: When Solo, the writer of one book, runs out of money for therapy, his therapist suggests getting a dog. Problems arise.

name: Majili
summary_text: A former cricket player nursing his wounds of a failed relationship takes up the task of training his ex-lover's daughter and in the process discovers his feelings towards his wife and her unrequited love for him.

name: Donbass
summary_text: In eastern Ukraine, society begins to degrade as the effects of propaganda and manipulation begin to surface in this post-truth era.

name: The Harmonists
summary_text: The film chronicles the rise and fall of Germany's most famous a capella group, the Comedian Harmonists, in 1930s Germany.

name: Se upp för Jönssonligan
summary_text: A reboot of the famous Swedish saga "Jönssonligan" ("The Jönsson Gang")

name: Sofra sirlari
summary_text: Meet Neslihan. A perfect cook, an expert on Turkish cuisine, strictly loyal to her husband, an impeccable house wife ...and a serial killer.

name: Blithe Spirit
summary_text: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writer's block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife, which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

name: Lu Bian Ye Can
summary_text: While travelling the countryside to locate his nephew, a small town doctor finds himself interacting with people from his past and future.

name: Tu la conosci Claudia?
summary_text: Giovanni is a simple man married to Claudia. Giacomo is divorced and happy, but his happiness vanishes when he sees the happiness between the two. Aldo is a taxi driver. The three men fall ...                See full summary »

name: Aaram Thamburan
summary_text: Jagannathan, a mafia don in Bombay moves to Kanimangalam village. He wins the love of the locals, but finds trouble with a feudal lord, Appan Thamburan, after he decided to resume a traditional festival banned by Appan.

name: Autumn Dreams
summary_text: Years after the annulment of their spontaneous marriage a couple discovers a mistake in the paperwork that means they are still husband and wife.

A young woman comes to in a roadside diner with no idea where she is or how she got there. Split between two timelines, she gets taken on a violent journey as she seeks out the person responsible for her lover's death.

name: Supernova
summary_text: Sam and Tusker are traveling across England in their old RV to visit friends, family and places from their past. Since Tusker was diagnosed with dementia two years ago, their time together is the most important thing they have.

name: Lured
summary_text: British police are after a serial killer who lures his female victims through newspaper personal ads and sends cryptic-poem clues to the cops.

name: The Only Son
summary_text: A widow sends her only son away to receive a better education. Years later, she visits him, finding him a poor school teacher with a wife and son.

name: Le Million
summary_text: An impoverished painter and his rival engage in a race across Paris to recover a jacket concealing a winning lottery ticket.

name: Young Ahmed
summary_text: A Belgian teenager hatches a plot to kill his teacher after embracing an extremist interpretation of the Quran.

name: Bickford Shmeckler's Cool Ideas
summary_text: When his journal of bright ideas is stolen, college freshman Bickford Schmeckler (Fugit) has to blanket the campus in order to locate it.

name: A Chinese Ghost Story II
summary_text: A Chinese Ghost Story II Chinese 倩女幽魂 II人間道 is a 1990 Hong Kong romantic comedy-horror film directed by Ching Siu-tung and produced by Tsui Hark. It is the sequel to A Chinese Ghost Story and is followed by A Chinese Ghost Story III.

name: Ice Castles
summary_text: An inexperienced yet naturally gifted ice skater makes a spectacular debut in the skating world before encountering an event that could possibly derail her hopes and dreams.

name: The World of Henry Orient
summary_text: A mischievous, adventuresome fourteen-year-old girl and her best friend begin following an eccentric concert pianist around New York City after she develops a crush on him.

name: Torment
summary_text: An idealistic adolescent, suffering under the thumb of a sadistic schoolmaster, falls in love with a loose girl who is bullied and tormented by another lover.
